akn:section.akn:heading: Transfers from Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Functions transferred to Secretary There are transferred to the Secretary—
(b) Offices, etc., transferred to Department There are transferred to the Department—

(c) Administrative functions transferred to Secretary There are transferred to the Secretary all functions of the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare, the Assistant Secretary for Education, or the Commissioner of Education of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, as the case may be, with respect to—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Reservation of functions relating to Project Head Start

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Reservation of functions relating to Project Head Start Nothing in the provisions of this section or in the provisions of this chapter shall authorize the transfer of functions under part A of title V of the Economic Opportunity Act of 1964 [42 U.S.C. 2928 et seq.], relating to Project Head Start, from the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to the Secretary.
